# `useSignInEmailPasswordless()`

## Overload 1 of 2

Passwordless email authentication hook

```js
const { signInEmailPasswordless, isLoading, isSuccess, isError, error } =
  useSignInEmailPasswordless()
```

### Parameters

---

**<span className="parameter-name">options</span>** <span className="optional-status">optional</span> `PasswordlessOptions`

---

### Examples

```js
const { signInEmailPasswordless, isLoading, isSuccess, isError, error } =
  useSignInEmailPasswordless()
```

```jsx
import { useState } from 'react'
import { useSignInEmailPasswordless } from '@nhost/react'

const Component = () => {
  const [email, setEmail] = useState('')
  const { signInEmailPasswordless, isLoading, isSuccess, isError, error } =
    useSignInEmailPasswordless()

  return (
    <div>
      <input
        value={email}
        onChange={(event) => setEmail(event.target.value)}
        placeholder="Email"
      />

      <button onClick={() => signInEmailPasswordless(email)}>
        Authenticate
      </button>

      {isSuccess && (
        <div>
          An email has been sent to {email}. Please check your mailbox and click
          on the authentication link.
        </div>
      )}
    </div>
  )
}
```
